creditline: The Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: black and white photograph of a man sitting in a chair with an open newspaper under a canopy against a building at right; a group of three people on the left side, standing and seated by brick building wall
marks: Signature and Date on back, in pencil: [David Goldblatt / 19/5/99]
title: A barber under his canopy and with a connection to electricity on Smit Street, Hillbrown, Johannesburg
